column1: Several genes involved in the metabolism of the antioxidant glutathione were found to be upregulated by cadmium exposure, namely the genes encoding the catalytic subunit of glutamate - cysteine ligase ( Gclc) that is the rate limiting enzyme in de novo synthesis of glutathione ( 45); glutathione reductase 1 ( Gsr), the reducing enzyme for oxidized glutathione ( 45); and glutathione - S - transferase, mu 4 ( Gstm4), which is a member of the glutathione - S - transferase supergene family of detoxification enzymes ( 45).
